file_insights.internal/llm/factory.go: Modified LLM Factory to support caching with new parameters (memoryCache, diskCache, cacheEnabled, cacheTTL). The CreateClient method now wraps base clients with caching when enabled.
file_insights.internal/agents/ai_rules_generator.go: Updated to pass new cache parameters to NewFactory (all nil/false/0 values disabling caching)
file_insights.internal/agents/analyzer.go: Updated to pass new cache parameters to NewFactory (all nil/false/0 values disabling caching)
file_insights.internal/agents/documenter.go: Updated to pass new cache parameters to NewFactory (all nil/false/0 values disabling caching)

patterns_discovered: Consistent pattern across agent constructors of calling llm.NewFactory with cache-disabled parameters
Factory pattern with optional dependency injection for caching components
Client wrapper pattern for adding caching capabilities to base LLM clients
Default values for cache TTL when not explicitly provided
gotchas_discovered: Multiple files needed simultaneous updates to maintain API compatibility
Nil checks required for cache instances before wrapping clients
Cache TTL needs fallback to DefaultTTL when explicitly set to 0
Must preserve existing behavior when caching is disabled

approach_outcome.approach: Extended existing Factory pattern with optional caching parameters, maintaining backward compatibility by providing zero values that disable caching
approach_outcome.outcome: SUCCESS - Successfully modified llm.NewFactory to create cached clients when caching is enabled, with all agent files updated to use the new signature

recommendations: Consider creating a builder pattern for complex Factory configurations
Add configuration constants for default cache settings
Consider factory method variants for common use cases (e.g., NewFactoryWithCaching)
Add unit tests for caching edge cases (nil caches, zero TTL, disabled caching)
